mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `organ` SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), `organNumber` = #{organNumber}, `organName` = #{organName}, `organAddress` = #{organAddress}, `organAdmAddress` = #{organAdmAddress}, `organTel` = #{organTel}, `organTime` = #{organTime}, `organWeekend` = #{organWeekend}, `organRemarks` = #{organRemarks}
